page.title: 01 Our Square
page.content: Our square lies about 5 miles north of Exeter and covers part of the Exe valley and the surrounding hills on either side, rising to a height of approximately 200 metres above sea level. Situated just away from the low lying valley floor are the villages of Thorverton, on the western side, and Silverton on the east. The area is one of mixed farming involving the rearing of both sheep and cattle, and the growing of a wide variety of arable crops. Both villages have some local employment but a good number of people work in the larger towns of Exeter and Tiverton.
